title: Materials chemistry contains all the elements of modern chemistry. These include synthesis, structure, dynamics, and properties. In synthesis, one employs all possible methods and conditions from high-temperature and high-pressure techniques to mild solution methods (chimie douce or soft chemistry)* Chemical methods generally tend to be more delicate
